name: Ninja Raider - Android Game
description:
The evil and corrupted galactic organization has stolen and taken the secret data. They jailed some important people, disabled them and put on the chairs. The Council of the best of Ninjas in the galaxy has chosen you to destroy that data and release the prisoners! Get you best ninja skills and do what you have to do to complete the mission! Become the best ninja you can be! 

Ninja Raider features:

*One finger controls: Touch down and drag your finger towards the direction that you want to move! Click to attack! 

*Ninja game!: Become ninja and use your best moves and sword attacks to beat your enemies!

 *Challenging levels: 120 difficult levels and more to come! 

*Retro arcade look: Pixel art, cool animations and white noise effects! Classic! 

*Different maps: Choose which maps to play! All are free and ready to start! 

*Difficult enemies: Every map got different sets of enemies! 

*Innovative gameplay: Enemies move only if you move! Use your best stategies to beat them!
